messages.title: Help Helen Korfanty stop a hard Brexit
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are leading the campaign against the Conservatives' hard Brexit. Only a Lib Dem win in Bury St Edmunds, Newmarket and Needham Market & the villages can challenge the damaging ‘hard’ Brexit that will hit jobs, our economy and services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only the Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs by raising a penny on income tax to provide an additional £6 billion for health and care services.
Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that’s why they are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in the Bury St Edmunds/Stowmarket area. Schools in Suffolk are set to lose £30 million from their budgets.

issues.brexitEurope: Fighting against Hard Brexit: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that’s why they are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
issues.education: Opposing school cuts: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in the Bury St Edmunds/Stowmarket area. Schools in Suffolk are set to lose £30 million from their budgets.
issues.health: Standing up for the NHS: Only the Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs by raising a penny on income tax to provide an additional £6 billion for health and care services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Helen Korfanty is fighting for real change for Bury St Edmunds.

contactInformation.address: Sudbury Road, Bury St Edmunds, IP33 3ES
